game.name: Easter Hunt
game.description: Easter Hunt, is a really cool Mahjong game. Where you have to match the colorful eggs together. This game plays like the classic Mahjong games, but this one has gotten an easter makeover! f you are really stuck in a level, you can ask for a tip or reshuffle the board, but the further you get, the less you will be able to use these abilities! Play the game and try to clear the boards before time runs out!
game.metaTitle: Easter Hunt, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Easter Hunt at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Easter Hunt Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE SAME 2 CONJUCATIVE EGGS
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE ON THE SAME 2 CONJUCATIVE EGGS
